title: Final Fantasy VII
quotes: I pity you. You just don't get it at all... there's not a thing I don't cherish!
No one lives in the slums because they want to. It's like this train. It can't run anywhere except where its rails take it.
Stay where you belong; in my memories.
Words aren't the only way to tell someone how you feel.
My honor, my dreams... they're yours now.
I am the chosen one. I have been chosen to be the leader of this Planet.
What I have shown you is reality. What you remember, that is the illusion.
There ain't no gettin' offa this train we on!
